definition: Buddha's teaching/Buddhist monk's apparel, staff etc/(Daoism) magic weapon/talisman/fig. specially effective device/magic wand
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: It is only a magic weapon for petrochemical enterprise to be stable long time.
sentences.chinese: 安全文化是石化企业长治久安的唯一法宝。

sentences.english: The independency is the magic weapon supporting China's sovereignty and safety.
sentences.chinese: 独立自主是维护中国主权与安全的法宝。

sentences.english: The article believed that emancipating the mind was the magic weapon of the enterprise success.
sentences.chinese: 解放思想是保证事业成功的法宝。

sentences.english: A great way to break up the classic black party dress is to add shine.
sentences.chinese: 打破老派黑色派对装魔咒的一大法宝就是增加闪光点。

sentences.english: It’s also a great icebreaker for meetings with new clients.
sentences.chinese: 它也是会见新客户打开僵局的法宝。

sentences.english: Those specifics are what will make your brand stand out from your competition.
sentences.chinese: 这些具体的东西才是在竞争中脱颖而出的法宝。

sentences.english: Keep reason, composedness is a magic weapon to deal with business.
sentences.chinese: 保持理智，镇定是你工作制胜的法宝。

sentences.english: Strategic use of symmetry (and the lack of it) is a powerful design tool.
sentences.chinese: 合适的使用对称是一个强大的设计法宝。

sentences.english: Let customer satisfaction is the business wins successfully subdues the magic weapon.
sentences.chinese: 让客户满意是商家赢得成功的制胜法宝。

sentences.english: At this moment, the professor is developing new applications for Flubber.
sentences.chinese: 此时，博士正在开发飞天法宝的新功能。

sentences.english: This is how you win the game of life.
sentences.chinese: 就是是你人生成功的三大法宝。

sentences.english: " According to Zhang Jiliang, this is his striving to "holding stability and pioneer" of the holy grail.
sentences.chinese: 据张继良介绍，这是他争当“维稳先锋”的制胜法宝。

sentences.english: Paper culture is a magic weapon of getting market.
sentences.chinese: 皓月人成就市场的法宝。

sentences.english: Coupled with the point of building the party itself they become the three main power weapons of the Chinese revolution.
sentences.chinese: 加上党本身的建设，就成为中国革命的三个主要法宝。

sentences.english: What will be the impact on business?
sentences.chinese: 这些“法宝”对商业有怎样的影响？

sentences.english: The Ideological and Political Education is the Partys tradition and weapon for success.
sentences.chinese: 思想政治教育是我党的优良传统和致胜法宝。

definition: Lingbao county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
magical object/object symbolic of imperial power/fine weapon
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
to brandish (a figurative weapon, i.e. some measure intended to deal with the situation)/to resort to (some tactic)
(Taoism) talisman in the form of a painting of symbols thought to have magical powers
robe of a Buddhist priest/ceremonial garment of a Daoist priest/robe of a judge, nun, priest etc/cassock/vestment
records/book/Taoist written charm/book of prophecy (e.g. of dynastic fortunes)
